name: Into the Wind
description:
Into the Wind - a game by Alexey Glukhov, Lindy Li Loong and Sebastien Giasson.

As a Wind Mage, recover Soul Spheres stolen from you across 4 highly explorable levels. Use fans to propel your way around. Collect Soul Spheres to complete the levels!

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Z to jump

Tap X to swing sword

Hold and release X to cast wind

All music used in from Cave Story by Studio Pixel.
